Promotion Terms

General Promotions

Promotion open to US residents ages 18+ only. Valid only for online orders made through jollibeefoods.com or the Jollibee® app for use at participating US Jollibee® restaurants. Not valid for orders: (a) made in person at Jollibee® restaurants or; (b) through third parties including but not limited to DoorDash®. Coupon must be surrendered at time of purchase. One coupon per registered user. One coupon per person per order. Value of promotional items may vary. May not be valid for custom orders or combined with any other offers. Taxes excluded. No cash value (unless prohibited by law, then cash value is $.005). No substitutions. Void if copied or transferred and where prohibited. Limited delivery areas. Order requirements and delivery fees may apply. Company reserves the right to withdraw or change any offer’sterms and conditions at any time, at Company’s discretion, and without notice.

Expires December 31, 2024.
